var response = JSON.parse(inputs.response)
var fail = false
if (!response) { outputs.hstatus = "NO_RESPONSE" fail = true }
if (response.resp) { outputs.transaction_id = response.resp.transactionId outputs.transaction_hash = response.resp.transactionHash outputs.node_id = response.resp.nodeId } else { fail = true }
if (response.receipt ) { outputs.hstatus = response.receipt.status outputs.account_id = response.receipt.accountId // outputs.token_id = response.receipt.tokenId // outputs.serials = response.receipt.serials // outputs.topic_id = response.receipt.topicId } else { fail = true }
if (response.record) { outputs.transaction_fee = response.record.transactionFee outputs.consensus_timestamp = response.record.consensusTimestamp } else { fail = true }
if (response.error) { outputs.hstatus = response.error.status fail = true }
outputs.fail = fail
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" var cmd = './hcli account create'

if (sign_with) { while (sign_with.next()) { cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + sign_with.public_key } }
outputs.cmd = cmd

var response = JSON.parse(inputs.response)
var fail = false
if (!response) { outputs.hstatus = "NO_RESPONSE" fail = true }
if (response.resp) { outputs.transaction_id = response.resp.transactionId outputs.transaction_hash = response.resp.transactionHash outputs.node_id = response.resp.nodeId } else { fail = true }
if (response.receipt ) { outputs.hstatus = response.receipt.status outputs.account_id = response.receipt.accountId // outputs.token_id = response.receipt.tokenId // outputs.serials = response.receipt.serials // outputs.topic_id = response.receipt.topicId } else { fail = true }
if (response.record) { outputs.transaction_fee = response.record.transactionFee outputs.consensus_timestamp = response.record.consensusTimestamp } else { fail = true }
if (response.error) { outputs.hstatus = response.error.status fail = true }
outputs.fail = fail
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value var key = inputs.key var memo = inputs.memo var rsr = inputs.rsr var sign_with = inputs.sign_with
var cmd = './hcli account create'
if (key.public_key) { cmd = cmd + ' --key ' + key.public_key } if (memo) { cmd = cmd + ' --memo ' + memo } if (rsr) { cmd = cmd + ' --reqsig' }
if (sign_with) { while (sign_with.next()) { cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + sign_with.public_key } }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value
